arcade.vis

Class ColorMaps

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.vis.ColorMaps

  • class ColorMaps
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for commonly used color maps.

    Uses Colors to define mappings.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.6
